Banner.Description: I am a software architecture engineering graduate from ESPRIT, motivated to start my career as a software engineer to turn my knowledge into real solutions. Passionate about new technologies, high-performance system design, web development, and software testing, I am dedicated to contributing to innovative projects and bringing real value to the team.

AboutMe.Education.School: Private Higher School of Engineering and Technology (ESPRIT)
Higher Institute of Multimedia Arts of Manouba (ISAMM)

AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: During my academic and professional projects, I had the opportunity to work on real-world applications that strengthened my technical and problem-solving skills. I enjoy turning ideas into functional, user-friendly solutions.

I contributed to several impactful software projects that involved designing, developing, and improving real-world applications. These experiences allowed me to collaborate effectively with teams, understand business requirements, and design efficient and scalable technical workflows.

I also enjoy exploring software quality and automation tools. I have worked with CI/CD pipelines, testing practices, and modern development environments to ensure clean, reliable, and maintainable code.
Some of the tools, frameworks, and architectures I frequently work with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Engineer Degree Final Year Internship
Description: Designed and developed an intelligent Learning Management System to centralize and automate employee training paths, improving accessibility and organization of training materials.
Integrated a request management workflow, allowing employees to submit training requests and managers to track and approve them efficiently.
Implemented personalized learning tracking to monitor employee progress and provide relevant feedback.
Included skills evaluation features to assess employee competencies and identify areas for improvement.
Enhanced talent development and improved internal process efficiency by streamlining training management and facilitating better oversight.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Summer Internship
Description: Designed and developed an innovative application for gyms, centralizing operations related to members, coaches, schedules, and subscriptions.
Created an ergonomic interface to optimize operational efficiency and enhance user experience.
Implemented features to manage memberships, track coaching schedules, and monitor subscription statuses effectively.
Ensured smooth interaction between frontend and backend systems to maintain reliable data flow and consistency.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Summer Internship
Description: Developed the frontend interface for an e-commerce application specialized in selling IoT devices, ensuring a user-friendly and responsive design.
Implemented business modules for product tracking, order management, and payment processing, enabling smooth and efficient operations.
Optimized interface components to improve navigation, usability, and overall user experience.

Experience.Jobs.Title: License Degree Final Year Internship
Description: Designed and deployed an Electronic Document Management (EDM) solution with automated workflows for document classification, storage, and archiving, enabling faster and more reliable handling of company documents.
Developed features to facilitate easy document retrieval, secure storage, and efficient management of digital files, reducing errors and improving accessibility.
Optimized internal processes by eliminating redundant manual tasks, decreasing dependency on paper, and enhancing overall operational efficiency.
Provided a scalable solution that supports future growth and ensures compliance with company document management standards.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Learning Management System (LMS)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Intelligent Learning Management System for centralizing and automating employee training paths, including training request workflows, personalized learning tracking, and skills assessment, designed to enhance talent development and internal process efficiency.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GymFlow
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Development of an innovative application for gyms, centralizing key operations for members, coaches, schedules, and subscriptions, with an intuitive interface aimed at optimizing operational efficiency and user experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Automated CI/CD for a School Management Application
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Automation of a CI/CD pipeline for a school management application. Integration of Nexus, SonarQube, Jenkins, and Prometheus/Grafana for automation and monitoring. Mockito tests, JaCoCo reports, and security scans ensure reliable deployments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: IoTShop
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Development of the frontend interface of an e-commerce application specialized in selling IoT devices, with implementation of business modules for product tracking, order management, and payment processing. Developed using Angular and PrimeNG.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MY WAY
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Design and development of a tourist transport application that guides tourists through their itineraries and displays available transport options and routes. The application includes web and mobile user interfaces for a smooth and seamless experience. Developed using JavaFX, Symfony framework, MySQL, and GitHub.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: LearnToCode
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Development of an interactive e-learning website including training sections, assessments, and learner progress tracking. The interface is designed to be intuitive and engaging, facilitating online learning. Developed using JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Electronic Document Management (EDM) Solution
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Design and deployment of an Electronic Document Management (EDM) solution integrating automated workflows for document classification, storage, and archiving, optimizing internal processes and reducing paper dependency. Developed with Symfony, Doctrine, JavaScript, and MySQL.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: EduConect
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Microservices project using Node.js, Spring Boot, MongoDB, MySQL, and Docker. It includes management of students and contacts via separate Spring services. Each service is containerized with Docker, enabling simplified management and smooth deployment of the infrastructure.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Book Reservation Manager
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Android application for managing book reservations, featuring full CRUD operations, search functionality, calendar-based reservations, and pagination for smooth and user-friendly navigation.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Alumni-Job Clustering
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Application using K-Means clustering to group alumni and job offers based on their characteristics. It matches alumni with offers in their cluster and visualizes the number of offers per domain. Users can enter an alumni ID to get the corresponding offers.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hireflix
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Full-stack application with Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend for managing students in the Hireflix platform, dedicated to company forums. Features include search and scheduled tasks using Spring Cron.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Selenium Automation Project
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This repository contains a hands-on Selenium automation testing project using Java. It is designed to learn UI test automation by building a real project, following best practices such as Page Object Model (POM), TestNG, and Maven.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: GymFlow
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Web application that makes it easy to search for gyms and coaches, view their services, and book sessions online. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for optimal management of users' fitness journey.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
